## Feedback Given

- **Ideas/Pitches**: 
  - During class I met with others and gave them feedback on their ideas. I mostly recommend Cloudflare to Isaac and some other friends in class.

- **Status Updates**: 
  - When we met for class I reported my progress and listened to others report their progress.

- **Questions Answered**: 
  - I answered design questions and shared what I had done to solve that problem. Most of my advice was to use Cloudflare.

- **Final Presentations**: 
  - I listened to people present and asked clarifying questions to better understand the product/solution/problem and shared thoughs on additional features.

## Active Listening

How did you demonstrate active listening?

- Asked clarifying questions during presentations.
- Summarized key points to confirm understanding.
- Addressed concerns that people brought up.

---

I enjoyed collaborting with everyone on their ideas and my ideas. I learned a lot about the general problems we face when starting a new project and trying to get all the pieces working together.
